item.title: Visual Artifacts in Nfield Manager
item.description: ISSUE 10:00 CET - Some customers report visual artifacts in the user interface of Nfield Manager NIPO SOFTWARE STEPS TAKEN Support engineers are attempting to reproduce and diagnose the reported problems. STATUS UPDATE 12:15 CET - Support engineers have conclusively determined that the problem was temporary and related to a...

item.title: CAPI Sync Failure
item.description:
ISSUE 16:59 CET - Some customers report repeated CAPI device data sync failures.
NIPO SOFTWARE STEPS TAKEN Support engineers are attempting to reproduce and diagnose the reported problems.
STATUS UPDATE 17:00 CET - Support engineers report being excited about the late nature of this problem. Some sarcasm detected.

item.title: Downtime: System wide maintenance
item.description: ISSUE REPORTED On February 20 at 19:00 we will be performing routine maintenance on our database and file servers. There may be brief interruptions to the site and services during this time. STATUS UPDATES Mar 10, 00:09 UTC Completed - Everything went smoothly. We’re done! Mar 10, 00:02 UTC In...

item.title: Network Service Interruptions
item.description: ISSUE REPORTED 1989-06-11 10:15 CET A small number of customers in the AM region are reporting major service interruptions. NIPO SOFTWARE INVESTIGATION Support Engineers are attempting to reproduce and resolve the syncing interruptions. STATUS UPDATE 1989-06-11 12:32 CET Support Engineers have determined that the interruptions were caused by extensive solar...
